amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that makes women sick again.

action.text: Amendment SA 82 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 82 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 23.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 82.
Amendment SA 82 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Gillibrand.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 82 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 23.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 82 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Gillibrand.
